# Vendored packages - fallback if PyPI is unavailable
# To use: pip install -r api/vendor/requirements-vendored.txt

# Install from local .whl files
./api/vendor/genagent-0.2.7-py3-none-any.whl
./api/vendor/supabase-2.3.4-py3-none-any.whl
./api/vendor/openai-1.51.2-py3-none-any.whl

# These should still come from PyPI (have many dependencies)
numpy==1.26.4
